评论详情: I absolutely loved this tunic top! I paid very close attention to the measurements in the size chart and ordered a 5X (I usually wear a 2X). The wife loves this. She made a comment when I handed it to her that she might not wanna take it off now. Says it fits and looks amazing.
I do like this shirt, it is a little tight in the midsection unfortunately, and the neon green ribbon really doesn't match very well so I need to replace it with a black one.

I wanted to Love this shirt. It looked like it would flatter, it does not. Absolutely no stretch in the bust or anywhere else for that matter. Very cheap costume fabric for the price. Last but not least, I ordered the black/purple and the purple is more of an eggplant, not a royal purple. Very disappointing😞
To say I love it is a massive understatement. It is so comfortable, flattering, and beautiful it has become one of my favorites. 10/10 would recommend

评论概述: But I don't like clothes really tight against my skin and get very ...
评论详情: I bought this top in 2012 in the wine color. The fabric is very soft against the skin, the lace sleeves are always soft (and not itchy, how some lace products can be). I'm 5'1", 175 lbs. I'm somewhere between a size 14(still too snug) and size 16 (slightly baggy). I ordered the 2x initially. When I went to order the top in purple this time, I toyed around with going with the XL/1X. But I don't like clothes really tight against my skin and get very self conscious about my 'rolls'. I ordered a 2x again because I can wear it slightly looser or cinch the waist for a more fitted look or even wear it as a dress (it comes down to about mid thigh on me). If I wanted a more form fitting top, I would have ordered the XL/1X. I can't say enough great things about this top. At first I wasn't sure about the cost. But the top I ordered in 2012 fits exactly the same as the one I purchased this year. Stitching is good. It is not a cheap fabric. Well worth the money in my opinion. My boyfriend bought me two more for Christmas!  I have also purchased another style of Dare to Wear blouse (Gothic Victorian Boho Women's Plus Size Electra Corset Top). Fit, fabric, stitching all great. I did order the other in an XL rather than 2X for when I want a more form fitting look. Hope this helps anyone considering buying one of these blouses!

Not worth what they charge for it.
